message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to offer it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $105.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking $95 would be a more reasonable price.
I'm still not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to compromise at $110, but that's as low as I can go.
I'm still interested in the product, and I'm willing to pay $85 for it.
I'm getting a bit frustrated that we're not meeting in the middle, but I'm willing to try one more time. I'll meet you at $100, but that's my final offer.
I'm willing to meet you at $82.50, which is as low as I'm willing to go.
I've already said I'd meet you at $100, and I'm not willing to go any lower than that. I think $100 is a fair price for a great product like this. I'm not budging.
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to pay more than $82.50. This is my final offer.
